feed.title: GitHub Smalltalk Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Smalltalk in GitHub

entry.title: moosetechnology/PetitParser
entry.summary: Petit Parser is a framework for building parsers.

entry.title: svenvc/ston
entry.summary: STON - Smalltalk Object Notation - A lightweight text-based, human-readable data interchange format for class-based object-oriented languages like Smalltalk.

entry.title: pharo-contributions/taskit
entry.summary: TaskIt is a library that ease Process usage in Pharo. It provides abstractions to execute and synchronize concurrent tasks, and several pre-built mechanisms that are useful for many application developers.
